//: Configuration for generating Snowflake DDL statements using dynamic schema inference.
//default_string_length: Default VARCHAR length for columns when dynamically inferring schemas (e.g., 64 for VARCHAR(64)). Used when max string length is null or cannot be determined.
//varchar_tiers: List of VARCHAR length tiers for dynamic inference. Selects the smallest tier >= max string length observed in the data. Covers up to 256KB for large fields (e.g., JSON, scripts).
//date_formats: List of date formats for detecting DATE columns during dynamic schema inference.
//timestamp_formats: List of timestamp formats for detecting TIMESTAMP columns during dynamic schema inference.
//usecols: List of column names to include when reading TSV files for schema inference. Empty list means all columns are included.
